CommodityBatchAtFinalConsumer(address,ui.notice: Tracks the commodities at the Consumer

commodityRecievedAtFinalConsumer(address.notice: Function to be called when the Consumer receives a commodity

sale(address).notice: Tracks the sale status of commodities

salesInfo(address).notice: Function to get sales information for a given commodity

updateSaleStatus(address,uint256).notice: Function to update the sale status of a commodity

documentation.text:
@notice Tracks the commodities at the Consumer
 @dev mapping of Consumer address to array of addresses

@notice Tracks the sale status of commodities
 @dev mapping of address to sale status
@dev Enumeration for possible statuses of the sale

@notice Event to be emitted when commodity status changes
 @dev Event includes the commodity address, Consumer's address and status
@title Model of Consumer's interaction with commodity
